oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MONOTERPENIC FRAGMENT ANALOGS OF APLASMOMYCIN AS POTENTIAL ANTIMALARIALS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALU, N
THOMAS, JV
BHAT, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: qinghaosu artemisinin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Seven analogues of monoterpenic fragment of aplasmomycin were synthesized as targeted antimalarial agents. The potency of the compound 6 was comparable with the sesquiterpene lactone artemisinin and the antibiotic aplasmomycin in vivo against Plasmodium berghei yoelli.
